hero.name: Simone Colli
hero.subtitle: CS Master's Student, Developer & Photographer
hero.description: Computer Science Master's student and photographer. I dedicate my career to solving problems and capturing detail.

aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.description: Hi, I'm Simone! I'm a Computer Science Master's student, passionate about software development and photography. My journey, both personal and academic, began as a child with artistic roller skating—a sport that taught me the values of resilience, discipline, and patience. Over the years, I learned the organizational skills needed to balance life as an athlete and a student. Today, those same lessons allow me to manage the rigor of my academic path and the attention to detail I apply to my projects.

footer.description: Computer Science student passionate about technology and sports photography. Always learning, between code and shots.

projects.pageDescription: A collection of software projects, experiments, and ideas turned into reality. Each project represents a milestone in my journey as a developer.

talks.pageDescription: A collection of academic presentations delivered at the University of Parma.

photography.pageDescription: Through my lens, I capture moments, emotions, and stories. Photography is my way of freezing time and preserving meaningful memories.
photography.noPhotos: No photos found in this category.

blog.pageDescription: Thoughts on software development, technology, photography, and other topics I'm passionate about.

about.bio1: Hi, I'm Simone! I'm a Computer Science Master's student, passionate about software development and photography. My journey, both personal and academic, began as a child with artistic roller skating—a sport that taught me the values of resilience, discipline, and patience. Over the years, I learned the organizational skills needed to balance life as an athlete and a student. Today, those same lessons allow me to manage the rigor of my academic path and the attention to detail I apply to my projects.
about.bio2: Throughout my academic and professional career, I have explored complex and diverse fields: from bioinformatics and parallel computing to artificial intelligence and cybersecurity. My experience spans from web development to operating system management and server environment configuration—areas that have given me a broad understanding of software infrastructure. I believe in the value of technical knowledge sharing, which is why I actively participate in open-source projects and community collaborations.
about.bio3: The passion I dedicated to sport for many years led me back to where I grew up, but with a new perspective. My goal today is to immortalize athletic gestures and the emotion of competition through sports photography. Along the way, I also love capturing the most significant moments in people's lives, such as graduations and events, as well as the small details of nature.

common.workInProgressMessage: I'm currently working on this section. Check back soon for updates!

personalWebsite.title: Personal Website
personalWebsite.description: A personal portfolio website showcasing my projects, skills, and professional experience.

quantumPortfolioOptimization.title: Quantum Portfolio Optimization
quantumPortfolioOptimization.description: A research project focused on optimizing portfolio allocation, enhancing traditional methods for improved risk-return management using quantum computing concepts.

academicGuaranteeOptimization.title: Academic Guarantee Optimization
academicGuaranteeOptimization.description: An Answer Set Programming (ASP) tool designed to optimize the assignment of academic guarantors to university courses.

pandelosPlus.title: PanDelos-plus
pandelosPlus.description: A parallel algorithm for efficiently computing sequence homology in pangenomic analysis.

deepNeuralNetworkLibrary.title: Deep Neural Network Library
deepNeuralNetworkLibrary.description: A flexible, high-performance C++ library for building, training, and deploying deep neural networks. Designed to be modular and easy to use.

uniprOrg.title: Unipr-org
uniprOrg.description: A collaborative GitHub organization uniting Computer Science students at the University of Parma. We create and share a comprehensive collection of course notes, study materials, and academic resources, promoting open collaboration and accessible learning.

mazeProject.title: MazeProject
mazeProject.description: An interactive maze game application developed for the European Researchers' Night 2022. It educates users on scientific concepts as they navigate through various challenges.

academicPresentationSASVExam.title: Static Analysis & Software Verification
academicPresentationSASVExam.description: An in-depth analysis of a selected research paper, presented for the Static Analysis and Software Verification exam at the University of Parma.

academicPresentationBddmExam.title: Big Data & Data Mining
academicPresentationBddmExam.description: A presentation exploring a specific research paper in the field of Big Data, delivered for the Big Data and Data Mining exam.

academicPresentationBddmReverse.title: Synthetic Data Generation
academicPresentationBddmReverse.description: A lecture on synthetic data generation techniques, presented during the Big Data and Data Mining reverse class.

academicPresentationCsExam.title: Cybersecurity: Infostealers
academicPresentationCsExam.description: A detailed presentation on Infostealers, analyzing their mechanisms and impact, created for the Cybersecurity exam.

academicPresentationFAIExam.title: AI: Contrastive Learning
academicPresentationFAIExam.description: An exploration of contrastive learning in spatial transcriptomics data, presented for the Fundamentals of Artificial Intelligence exam.

academicPresentationLIaCExam.title: Compilers: Loop Unrolling
academicPresentationLIaCExam.description: A technical presentation on loop unrolling optimization techniques, delivered for the Languages, Interpreters, and Compilers exam.

0.title: Freelancer
0.description: Launch of freelance career focused on developing custom software solutions and producing professional visual content.

1.title: PanDelos-plus Preprint
1.description: First author of the paper 'PanDelos-plus: A parallel algorithm for computing sequence homology in pangenomic analysis', released on arXiv.

2.title: Teaching Assistant & Seminars
2.description: Tutor for Operating Systems and Software Engineering courses at the University of Parma. Speaker at seminars on tutoring methodologies and Python programming.

3.title: Tutoring Perspectives
3.description: Delivered the talk 'Il tutorato da diverse prospettive e strumenti informatici a supporto', focusing on methodologies and software tools to support academic mentoring.

4.title: BBCC2024 Conference - Naples
4.description: Presented PanDelos-plus at the BBCC2024 conference in Naples.

5.title: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science
5.description: Graduated with a thesis on a parallel algorithm for pangenomic sequence analysis. Enrolled in the Master's degree program in Computer Science at the University of Parma.

6.title: Bioinformatics Internship
6.description: Developed parallel software for pangenome analysis using C++, Python, and Bash.

7.title: Open Source Collaboration
7.description: Founded and maintained unipr-org, an organization dedicated to collaborative open-source projects for university students.

8.title: Freelance Tutor & Photographer
8.description: Provided tutoring in C, C++, Java, Python, algorithms, and web development. Offered professional photography services for events.

9.title: MazeProject - Science Outreach
9.description: Created a web application to visualize graph search algorithms for the European Researchers' Night.

10.title: Cybersecurity Training
10.description: Completed CyberChallenge.it, a national training program in cybersecurity and CTF competitions.

11.title: Artistic Roller Skating Athlete
11.description: Competed as a high-level athlete, developing resilience, discipline, and teamwork skills.
